name: powerpoint-automation
description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations from web articles, blog posts, existing PPTX files. Ideal for tech presentations, reports, and documentation.
description_ja: Web記事、ブログ、既存PPTXからプロフェッショナルなPowerPointプレゼンテーションを作成。技術プレゼン、報告書、ドキュメント作成に最適。
whenToUse: Use this skill when the user wants to: convert web articles/blog posts to PPTX, translate English PPTX to Japanese, create presentations using templates, generate technical presentations with code blocks and diagrams, or automate presentation creation with quality assurance.
